messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] How cool is Sandra - Way- Cool!!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/6/03 11:04:18 PM, conniecolten@aol.com writes:  Thank you, Connie! I just realized that I missed
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/6/03 11:04:18 PM, conniecolten@... writes:

<< I wanted to publicly thank her. >>

Thank you, Connie!

I just realized that I missed your chat on Monday. I printed out the
announcement, but ended up being at my mom's that morning and at a movie with kids
and a guest that afternoon, and the week just rolled crazily by.

Thanks for the nice note.

Sandra

messages.subject: How cool is Sandra - Way- Cool!!
messages.msgSnippet: I know we all know this - but I wanted to share. In the middle of Holly s party, taking care of her Mom, and all the rest of what she was doing last week,
messages.messageBody:
I know we all know this - but I wanted to share.

In the middle of Holly's party, taking care of her Mom, and all the rest of
what she was doing last week, Sandra read the rough of my book, and gave some
some wonderful comments to use on the back of the cover for the blurb.

What did she write you might ask?

This book has something others miss: the changes that take place in a parent
who lives consciously and mindfully with children. Natural learning is quite
different from "school at home," and can be hard to explain or imagine. It
comes not from "what to do" stories, but from considerations of how to live.
Not all homeschoolers have models and mentors, but this book can be the next
best thing. Not only are the Coltens' lives shared, but other homeschooling
families have offered glimpses of their own herein as well. Many questions are
answered.

Not only that, she took the time to send me the corrections she saw that
needed to be made. She not only has a sharp wit, but a sharp eye!

I wanted to publicly thank her.

Connie

ps - if you want to visit the website of the book it is:

www.homeschoolingreflections.com





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
